extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites    Level 3 and (reg in a DRAM Major or Medial Plan, or COCA-CODR Sub-Plan, or STSC Spec. Plan) and (a grade of B- in DRAM237) and (a GPA of 2.60 in DRAM) or permission of the Department).

basic.description: An introduction to playing Shakespeare. Ways of breathing life into the text thereby communicating a character's thoughts, wants and emotional state to an audience will be explored.
basic.subject: DRAM
basic.title: Playing Shakespeare
